attributes.action: In order if acknowledging the current crisis of covid-19.
attributes.background: I would like the key workers to be the face of 50ps to honour their hard work in keeping the country going

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Coins are manufactured and issued by the Royal Mint, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more here: https://www.royalmint.com/discover/uk-coins/coin-design-and-specifications/
